alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 22 at 2:50PM CST until January 23 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper and Southern Newton Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton
